cause.description:
http://www.nwf.org/action
What do wolves, salmon, panthers, bison, whooping cranes, waterfowl, polar bears and other creatures big and small have in common?
They have YOU as their champion.
Whatever challenges they face--from global warming to habitat destruction to unchecked oil and gas development--stand up and protect the wildlife and wild places near you.
Sign up for a free monthly E-newsletter to help animals! http://online.nwf.org/nwfactivistsignup
1. We must address global warming.
2. We must focus on wildlife conservation.
3. We must strengthen the Endangered Species Act.
4. We must combat invasive species.
cause.mission: To inspire people to protect wildlife for our children's future.
cause.name: Protect Wildlife
